casebody.data:
(Republished)

Irma Zayas, Individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Mario Zayas, Deceased, Respondent, v Lux Service Corp. et al., Appellants, and Marcos Claudio, Respondent. Julio Delgado, Respondent, v Marcos Claudio, Respondent, and Lux Service Corp. et al., Appellants. Caoniba Orona, as Guardian of Ramon Orona, Jr., an Infant, and as Administratrix of the Estate of Ramon Orona, Deceased, Respondents, v Marcos Claudio, Respondent, and Lux Service Corp. et al., Appellants.

Judgment, Supreme Court, New York County, entered August 9, 1974, unanimously affirmed. Respondents Orona and Claudio shall recover of appellants one bill of $60 costs and disbursements of this appeal. The order of this court entered on April 3, 1975 is vacated. Concur — Markewich, J. P., Murphy, Lupiano, Tilzer and Lynch, JJ. [47 AD2d 867.]
